desc: Buy jewellery online or at our Winmalee Village store. We stock a hand picked range of beautiful jewellery & Watches from brands such as Najo, Thomas Sabo, Ania Haie, Nomination Italy, Qudo, Sekonda, Coure de Lion to name just a few. Our services Jewellery & Watch repairs, Custom Jewellery design & restringing Pearls.
